BB: Sorry I haven�t been online. My cabin burnt and my computer went with 
it.

3 days ago BrightBlade had died of a disease  in the forests surrounding the 
Cybertronean Fire, her body left to rot with the surrounding leafs.
But even her death wasn�t for nothing. She�d died after days and nights of 
hard labor, trying to keep her little treasure alive.
Somehow, someway, her systems had created a child that had grown inside of 
her until, at the weakest point, it was born.
A blind, tiny kit that could fit in the palm of a human hand, a baby girl 
with a mother already diseased and ready to die.
And so she had, leaving the baby to suckle whatever milk was left in her 
body before she stopped producing and it dried up.
But now the milk was gone, BrightBlade�s body already beginning to rot, and 
the little baby slightly weak from malnutrition.
Tiny as she was, still so young and blind, she�d managed to hang on this 
long with a hungry tummy. Every sound causing her to whine and cry, little 
yipps filling the forest whenever the wind picked up.  Too young to be 
frightened, all she ever did was crawl around her mother�s body, urged close 
by her familiar scent even when hunger gnawed.
But today the rank smell of BrightBlade�s body masked her scent and the 
little kit was confused, bleating for her mother as she slowly crawled on 
her tummy away from the body, trying to find the smell of Mom.
She moved out towards the forest and the clearing beyond.
Being only 3 days old, her muscles worked in tiny spasms and she couldn�t 
control them beyond crawling, but always she was yipping and crying out, 
hoping for mother to hear her and come and get her. Remembering the furry 
side where life giving milk came from.
But her mother never came and she was getting cold, her tummy making little 
hungry sounds.
Even though her eyes weren�t open yet she could hear, and she shots coming 
from the clearing reminded her of the soft rumbles her mother made. So, 
thinking of her mother, she cried louder as she tried to hurry her crawling, 
little red coat spotted here and there with ash as she moved along the 
forest floor. Moving towards the battle at the maximal base. Covering no 
more then 1-� feet in 2 min.
